div.p: I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending 31st December 1884.

cell.p:
Total — Eight hundred and sixty two pounds ten shillings and
pen

p.seg: This total has been initialled by Berry.

font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: There is no signature here; however, T. Wilson, Under Secretary, has initialled the Estimate on the lower right of the document. M subsequently submitted a revised set of Estimates, for the period to 30 November 1884 only, and these were approved by Berry; see M to G. Berry, 22 September 1884.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

cell.p: Signature of the Officer authorized to certify to accounts Ferd. von Mueller.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
